CONTENT: 沈みながら 息を吐き出す
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Dejar salir el aire mientras me hundo...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Breathing out as I sink to the bottom...

CONTENT: 吐いて 体の浮き輪を捨てていくように重くなりながらも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Exhalo y, aunque me siento pesada mientras abandono mi cuerpo,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I breathe out, and though I feel heavy as I leave my floatie of a body behind,

CONTENT: 私は解放されていく
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I am being freed.

CONTENT: あぶくを見上げながら
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I looked up at the bubbles

CONTENT: 背中がつくまで沈んでいった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: me hundí hasta que mi espalda tocó el fondo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: as I let myself sink until my back touched the bottom.

CONTENT: 姉ちゃん 姉ちゃーん!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sis! Sis!

CONTENT: 今のメッセージ 何?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What even was that message just now?

CONTENT: そ... そのままだけど　腹筋 で... できるかなあって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: A lo que decía... Solo me pregunto si sabes hacer abdominales.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-It's exactly how it sounds... I-I was wondering if you can do sit-ups.

CONTENT: 腹筋?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sit-ups?

CONTENT: ほっ! できたけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I mean, I just did one, but...

CONTENT: そりゃ すごい　実は私 足を押さえてもらわないとできないんだよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me parece genial. A mí no me salen a no ser que alguien me sujete los pies.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's amazing. You see, I can't do any unless someone holds down my feet.

CONTENT: そうなの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Seriously?

CONTENT: そうなの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Seriously.

CONTENT: そうなんだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I see...

CONTENT: それだけ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is that all?

CONTENT: うん それだけ じゃっ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yup. That's it. Bye.

CONTENT: 何だ? 今の会話
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What the heck was that conversation?

CONTENT: そろそろ行くぞー!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We're leaving!

CONTENT: ほいほいほい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yup, yup, yup, yup.

CONTENT: いやー よく頑張った うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Man... That was a good workout.

CONTENT: アホ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You dummy.

CONTENT: あんた 歩きで5分って...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Seriously? You just walked for five minutes?

CONTENT: まったく 体験チケットの元ぐらい取ってちょうだいな!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vaya tela. Deberías aprovechar el cupón de prueba.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Honestly. At least get the most out of this trial voucher.

CONTENT: ところで あんた学校 ちゃんと行ってんの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por cierto, ¿estás yendo al instituto todos los días?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: By the way, have you been going to school every day?

CONTENT: 毎日 出て行ってるじゃん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero si me ves salir de él todos los días.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You see me leave every day.

CONTENT: その行き先が学校とは限らない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That doesn't mean you're actually going to school.

CONTENT: い... 行ってるよ ちゃんと
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I-I am, though...

CONTENT: ちゃんと行っておかないとあんたが苦労するのよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Como no vayas, la única que va a sufrir eres tú.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You're the one that's going to suffer if you don't go.

CONTENT: それと 周りの人間も
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y la gente de tu alrededor.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And the people around you.

CONTENT: 周りの重荷になるような人間にはならないようにって　昔から教えてるでしょ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si algo te he enseñado es a no dar problemas a la gente de tu alrededor.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I've always taught you not to be a burden to those around you, haven't I?

CONTENT: 分かっていると言ってその場は逃げた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Le dije que vale y me fui.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I just said I know and left.

CONTENT: 人に迷惑をかけるなは母が最も私に強く教えることだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No dar problemas a los demás es lo único en lo que mi madre me ha insistido.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Not being a burden to others is the one thing my mom had always drilled into me.

CONTENT: きっと 私が将来ろくでなしになることを危惧しての意味なんだろう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Seguro que tiene miedo de que no llegue a nada en el futuro.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm sure she feared that I'd end up a good-for-nothing in the future.

CONTENT: 迷惑をかけるな
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't be a burden...

CONTENT: 例えばここで浮かんでいることが　誰かに迷惑をかけているだろうか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por ejemplo, ¿flotar por aquí supondría un problema?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: For example, is the fact that I'm floating here actually burdening anyone?

CONTENT: 学校のサボりも同様に
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Just like when I'm skipping school...

CONTENT: 井戸の底みたいな息の詰まる場所
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me escapo de clase porque siento como
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm just escaping being in a classroom because it feels like

CONTENT: 教室から逃げているだけだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: si estuviera en un pozo sin poder respirar.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm stuck at the bottom of a well and can't breathe.

CONTENT: 私がいなくても 授業は進む　何ら滞りなく
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Aunque falte, las clases continuarán sin inmutarse.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Classes will continue even if I'm not there, without a hitch.

CONTENT: 見上げる水面の色は染まるように青い
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cuando veo la superficie del agua, todo se vuelve azul.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Looking up at the water's surface, it turned everything blue.

CONTENT: 安達の飲むミネラルウォーターのラベルを思い起こさせる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me recordó a la marca de agua que bebe Adachi.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It reminded of the label of the mineral water Adachi drinks.

CONTENT: アクアブルーだった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It was a brilliant shade of aqua.

CONTENT: なぜかそれだけの色と反射が 尊い
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por alguna razón, el color y los reflejos me parecieron preciosos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Somehow, just that color and the reflections seemed precious.

CONTENT: おりゃっ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hiyah.

CONTENT: この...いい年こいて...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Seriously, how old are you?

CONTENT: やっぱ 入会してよかった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me alegro de haberme apuntado a este gimnasio.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm so happy I joined this gym...

CONTENT: たまには 僕もひらめくもんだなあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Hasta a mí se me ocurren genialidades a veces.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I guess even I get some excellent ideas at times.

CONTENT: やるやるー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll do it!

CONTENT: えー それ 先週やったー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Eso lo hicimos la semana pasada. -¡Yo prime!
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We did that last week! I'll go first!

CONTENT: 気に入らない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't like you.

CONTENT: ここ ジジババだらけだからさ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Como este lugar está lleno de gente mayor,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: This place is filled with grandpas and grandmas,

CONTENT: 私ぐらいの年でも 一番若くて優越感に浸れんのよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: incluso alguien de mi edad puede sentirse superior siendo la más joven.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: so even someone my age gets to enjoy being the youngest and feeling superior.

CONTENT: で そういうところにあんたが来たの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y has tenido que venir tú a fastidiarlo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And then you had to show up.

CONTENT: だから 分かるでしょ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You understand what I'm getting at, right?

CONTENT: はあ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Sure...

CONTENT: なんちゃって　でも 若い子は珍しいのよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Era broma. Es extraño ver a alguien de tu edad por aquí.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm just kidding. But it is rare to see someone young like you here.

CONTENT: そう でしょうね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm sure it is.

CONTENT: あら 安達さん 来てたの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Vaya, no sabía que estabas aquí, Adachi.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, I didn't know you were here, Ms. Adachi.

CONTENT: あら 島田さん こんにちは　安達...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh! Well, hello, Ms. Shimada Adachi...

CONTENT: おおーっ 運命ー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Esto debe de ser el destino.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ah... So this is destiny.

CONTENT: 日本は狭い
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Japan is tiny.

CONTENT: まさか 安達の母親とこんなところで会うなんて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Quién habría imaginado que me encontraría aquí con la madre de Adachi?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Who would've thought I'd run into Adachi's mom in a place like this.

CONTENT: 安達は 親の話を嫌う
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Adachi odia hablar de sus padres.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi hates talking about her parents.

CONTENT: 口をつぐんでほとんど語らない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cuando le saco el tema, no dice nada.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Her lips tighten and she never really talks about them.

CONTENT: 安達の親への感情に温度はない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No veo que Adachi aprecie a sus padres.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't feel any warmth in how Adachi feels about her parents.

CONTENT: そういえば 娘さん今いくつだった?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por cierto, ¿qué edad tiene tu hija?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: By the way, how old is your daughter now?

CONTENT: 15 高1よ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's 15. A first-year in high school.

CONTENT: じゃあ 受験が終わって気楽じゃない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sin exámenes seguro que ya es todo más fácil.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Then things must be easier now that entrance exams are over.

CONTENT: まあねー
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes...

CONTENT: でも 気楽って言っても手のかかる子で困ってるのよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero le encanta dar problemas. Ya no sé qué hacer con ella.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They are, but she's such a troublemaker. I just don't know what to do with her.

CONTENT: 学校だって行くには行ってるけど　真面目にやってるんだか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Al menos va a clase, pero quién sabe si se está esforzando.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She at least goes to school, but who knows if she's actually trying?

CONTENT: 何考えているのかも話さないし　よく分かんないの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Nunca dice lo que piensa. No la entiendo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She never says what she's thinking. I just don't get her.

CONTENT: 暗い子でねえ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She's such a depressing child.

CONTENT: 人見知りするし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And she's shy.

CONTENT: あの...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Excuse me.

CONTENT: あだ... お子さんのことはよく知らないけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No conozco a Ada... a su hija,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't... know Ada... your daughter very well,

CONTENT: そういう言い方よくないと思います
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero no debería hablar así de ella.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but maybe you shouldn't talk about her like that.

CONTENT: 手をかけてないから分からなくなるんじゃないですか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No la entiende porque quizás no lo ha intentado.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Maybe you don't understand her because you haven't actually tried to understand her.

CONTENT: あんたねえ　別に議論とかするつもりありません
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Who do you-? I'm not trying to start an argument.

CONTENT: あんた 親と来てるの?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you here with a parent?

CONTENT: そうですけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I am. And?

CONTENT: 名前は? 誰?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What's their name?

CONTENT: そんなこと関係ないと思います　話し合いはしません
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Eso no importa. No tiene nada que hablar con usted.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That really has nothing to do with this. They're not going to talk to you.

CONTENT: どっちが正しいかなんて分からないから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Como no sé quién tiene la razón,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't exactly know what's right here,

CONTENT: 正しいと決めるために勝負しましょう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: so let's have a competition to decide what's right.

CONTENT: 勝負?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: A competition?

CONTENT: サウナに最後まで残っていた方の勝ち
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Ganará quien aguante más en la sauna.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Whoever can stay in the sauna longer wins.

CONTENT: 私が勝ったらこっちが正しいので
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si gano, yo tengo la razón.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If I win, I'm right.

CONTENT: 今日だけ 子供にいい母親面してみてください
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Y, solo por hoy, le pediré que sea una buena madre.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So just for today, I ask that you actually be a good mom to your daughter.

CONTENT: それは若い子なりの反抗ってやつ?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Esta es tu forma de ser desafiante o qué?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is this your way of being defiant or something?

CONTENT: そういうのです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Pretty much.

CONTENT: 何分たっただろう耳鳴りが 少し強まってきた
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Cuánto ha pasado? Los zumbidos de los oídos están empeorando.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I wonder how long it's been. The ringing in my ears is getting worse.

CONTENT: 安達は 想像もしてないだろう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Seguro que Adachi ni se imagina
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm sure that Adachi could never even imagine

CONTENT: 自分の母親が 同級生とサウナで幼稚な争いをしていることを
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: que su madre y su amiga están compitiendo en la sauna como si fueran dos niñas pequeñas.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: that her mom and her classmate were childishly duking it out in the sauna right now.

CONTENT: ねえ　いい母親って何?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Dime, ¿cómo es una buena madre para ti?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So, what exactly is a good mom to you?

CONTENT: 私 母親になったことないから分かりません
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No lo sé porque nunca he sido madre.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't know because I've never been a mother.

CONTENT: あなたの理想でいいから 教えてくれない?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pues dime cómo te gustaría que fuera.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Just give me your ideal then.

CONTENT: 別に 普通ならいいと思いますけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Creo que bastaría con ser normal y corriente.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I think just a normal mom would be fine.

CONTENT: 普通って?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Normal?

CONTENT: 子供と一緒にいてご飯食べて とか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Quizás sea estar con tus hijos y comer con ellos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Like being with your kid and having dinner with them, maybe?

CONTENT: そんなの知らないよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: How am I supposed to know?

CONTENT: 負けてあげようか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Want me to let you win?

CONTENT: あげなくていいです
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You don't have to let me win.

CONTENT: あげて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Let me.

CONTENT: あげない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No.

CONTENT: あげてやる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'll do it.

CONTENT: あげないでください
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Please don't.

CONTENT: 喜んでるならさあ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If she's actually happy...

CONTENT: 喜んでるならそうですって言ってほしいのよね
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Si fuera feliz, me gustaría que me lo dijera.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: If she's actually happy, I wish she'd just tell me.

CONTENT: 娘のこと?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Are you talking about your daughter?

CONTENT: そう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yes.

CONTENT: どこへ連れてっても引っ込んでばかりで
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Haga lo que haga, se encierra en sí misma.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She just shuts herself off from everyone, no matter where I take her.

CONTENT: 楽しいのか不満なのかも分からない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No sé si se divierte o está nerviosa.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I have no idea if she's having fun or anxious.

CONTENT: いくつの話?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: When was this?

CONTENT: 5歳かな あっ 4歳かも
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cuando tenía cinco o cuatro años.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She was probably five? Oh, maybe four.

CONTENT: そんな子供の時の話じゃなくて　今の子供の話を考えれば?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Por qué piensa en el pasado? ¿Por qué no piensa en el presente?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Why are you thinking about the past? Why not think about your daughter now?

CONTENT: 親が いちいち何か言ったらうるさいだけでしょ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: A nadie le gusta escuchar a su madre a esta edad.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: No one likes listening to their mother at that age.

CONTENT: 私も そうだったし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Por lo menos, a mí no me gustaba.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I sure didn't.

CONTENT: そう だけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's true, but...

CONTENT: よしっ　そろそろ 負けてあげる
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Okay, I'll go ahead let you win.

CONTENT: いいですって
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You don't have to.

CONTENT: 娘って
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: My daughter...

CONTENT: ああ まあ いいや
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Ah, well. Whatever...

CONTENT: 前にも こんなことなかった?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿No es la primera vez que pasa?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Didn't this happen before?

CONTENT: あったけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah...

CONTENT: あのときは 私がしてもらう方
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero la última vez lo hiciste por mí.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But last time, you were doing this for me.

CONTENT: あっ そっか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, right.

CONTENT: 大丈夫? さっきから足が引きつってるみたいだけど
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Estás bien? Te tiemblan las piernas desde hace rato.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You okay? Your legs seem to keep twitching.

CONTENT: えっ ええ うん　たいしたことじゃないから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: U-Um... Yup. It's not a big deal.

CONTENT: 昨日さ 母親がおかしかった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: ¿Sabes qué? Ayer mi madre estaba rara.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So yesterday... My mom was being weird.

CONTENT: おかしいって?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She was weird?

CONTENT: 一緒に ご飯を食べたの
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: We had dinner together.

CONTENT: それ おかしなこと?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And that's weird?

CONTENT: おかしい 懐かしいとも言える
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es raro, aunque un poco nostálgico.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's weird... and sort of nostalgic.

CONTENT: あとは 息苦しい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But also suffocating.

CONTENT: いつもご飯は作ってくれるんだけど　一緒に食べることってなかったから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Aunque siempre me hace la comida, no comemos juntas nunca.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: She always makes food for me, but we never eat together.

CONTENT: 家にいることが少ないし
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And she's rarely ever home.

CONTENT: 嬉しかった?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Did it make you happy?

CONTENT: あんまり　何か落ち着かなくてご飯の味が分からなかった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No mucho. Estaba tan nerviosa que ni saboreé la comida.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Not really. I was so anxious that I had no idea what the food tasted like.

CONTENT: でも　何だったんだろう あれ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: A saber a qué vino eso.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I wonder what all that was about though.

CONTENT: さあ 分かりかねますねえ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I can't say that I have a clue.
Y-You're c-close...

CONTENT: 安達
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adachi... Huh?

CONTENT: はっ ご... ごめ...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: S-Sorry!

CONTENT: しまむら?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura?

CONTENT: するもんだね 安達のニオイ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I guess I really can smell you...

CONTENT: そうだ 安達 腹筋してみて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, yeah. Adachi, do some sit-ups for me.

CONTENT: はっ? 腹筋?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Huh? Sit-ups?

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I picked karaoke. Nagafuji wanted to eat somewhere,

ただ遠くを見ていた

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: So, how was it? It was okay.

CONTENT: ミネラルウォーター なかったよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: They didn't have your usual mineral water.

CONTENT: ありがとう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Thanks...

CONTENT: しまむらの家 風通りいいね

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's nice and breezy near your house.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Isn't the view amazing, too?

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You don't like doing stuff like that, do you?

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No pasa nada, invítame otra vez. Ni que sufra por eso.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Okay.

CONTENT: で?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: And?

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: You kept looking at me at karaoke.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Was I staring that hard?

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yup.

CONTENT: き... 気のせいだと思う

CONTENT: 何回も目が合ったけど

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Our eyes met so many times.

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I have a bunch of things I want to say to Shimamura...

CONTENT: でも どれも 言ったら　奇異な目で見られるか逃げられるか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero, si se las digo, creo que me miraría de otra forma o huiría...

CONTENT: そんなことばかりのような気がして　尻込みして たまる よどむ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Como siempre pienso en eso, al final me echo para atrás. Las cosas se acumulan y se estancan.

CONTENT: 首から上に様々なものが たまってゆく

CONTENT: 果実が熟すように 養分が集い
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Es como cuando una fruta madura y recoge sus nutrientes,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Like when a fruit ripens and gathers nutrients,

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: pero al cabo del tiempo se pudre y cae al suelo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: but after some time, it rots and falls to the ground.

CONTENT: そんな思いだ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That's how it felt.

CONTENT: その一端からはみ出た苗木のように
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Como un árbol cuando emerge del suelo,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Just like a sapling sticking out of the ground,

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: the end peeks out and tries to escape my mouth.

CONTENT: 押さえたけれど間に合わなかった

CONTENT: しまむら
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Shimamura.

CONTENT: もう 頭を上げられなかった

CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Hm.

CONTENT: 後悔と凝固した何かを何度も乗り越えては絶望し

CONTENT: 安達は 甘えん坊だな

CONTENT: 時間も地球も立ち止まって私達を見ている気がした
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Sentí como si el tiempo y el mundo se hubieran detenido para vernos.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It felt like time and the Earth had just come to a stop and were staring at us.

CONTENT: 激しい動悸と裏腹に
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Aunque me latía mucho el corazón,
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Despite how fast my heart was beating,

CONTENT: 心は涙を静かにこぼしそうなほど落ち着く
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: estaba tan relajada que casi que tenía ganas de llorar.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: my heart was so calm I almost wanted to cry softly.

CONTENT: 同級生の女の子に頭をなでられて喜ぶなんて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me siento feliz porque una chica de mi clase me acaricia la cabeza.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm so happy right now from a girl from my class patting me on the head.

CONTENT: 私は どうなんだろう　バカなのか? 変なのか?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: What's with me? Am I stupid? Am I weird?

CONTENT: きっとどちらも 該当していて
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Seguro que es un poco de todo.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I'm sure it's actually a little bit of both...

CONTENT: もういい?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Is that enough?

CONTENT: うん
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Yeah...

CONTENT: お姉ちゃんって教室で呼ばないでよ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Don't call me Big Sis in class, okay?

CONTENT: あっ 一緒に捨ててくるから空き缶ちょうだい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Dame la lata, yo te la tiro.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, give me your can. I'll go throw it away for you.

CONTENT: あっ これ まだ残ってるから
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, there's still some left.

CONTENT: そう
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Oh, okay.

CONTENT: ウソをついた　缶の中身は空っぽだった
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Era mentira. La lata estaba vacía.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I lied. The can was actually empty.

CONTENT: しまむらと特別でありたい
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Quiero ser alguien especial para ella.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I want to be someone special to Shimamura.

CONTENT: 変な意味はない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: No lo digo en sentido extraño.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I don't mean that in a weird way.

CONTENT: しかし 特別であるのなら変でも かまわない
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Pero si fuera especial, me daría igual que fuera extraño.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: But if I actually was special to her, I don't care if it's weird.

CONTENT: 要するに好きなんだろうなあと思った
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Me he dado cuenta de que me gusta.
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: I came to the realization that I guess I really do like her.

CONTENT: あだしまペディア カラオケ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Adashimapedia: Karaoke!

CONTENT: ノリノリで歌っているときに店員が入ってきたら
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_SPANISH: Cuando lo estás dando todo y viene la del karaoke...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: That moment when you're singing your heart out and the employee comes in.

CONTENT: ガチャ 失礼しまーす
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Pardon me!

CONTENT: まさかのご本人登場ですか
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wait! The real employee just showed up!

CONTENT: いや 店員...
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Er, I...

CONTENT: すごい ご本人だ
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: Wow, it's the real deal! Seriously...

CONTENT: 店員の日野さんですよね?
CONTENT_TRANSLATION_ENGLISH: It's the employee, Hino!
